CanSendResponse - Interface in lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.service.exceptions
 
changeEmail(EmailChangeRequestDTO) - Method in class lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.api.UserController
Change current user Email.
POST request
User can still login with the old email, until email change is confirmed.
Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
Header format:
{"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
